title: [Fan Art] Saito Takeda, The Black Hand of Zaun.
body:
>http://i.imgur.com/7apfw58.png
>[Text source](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/story/evelynn-color-story)
"Saito Takeda leaned his elbows upon the lacquered surface of his desk, the thick leather of his gloves creaking as he steepled his fingers. What had once been heavy slabs of muscle in years gone by had slowly given way to fat, but he was still a big, intimidating man. His gaze was inscrutable, his eyes having long been replaced with soulless, reflective black lenses."

>"Takeda’s inherent violence and ambition had seen him rise from humble beginnings to become one of Zaun’s most powerful Chem-Barons, the infamous rulers of the undercity."



I'm celebrating the down time before the second half of this so far amazing [Zaun LU](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover#zaun). The character above is a non-champ figure, who has intrigued me since his first mentioning as the most infamous Chem-Baron. I had a love hate relationship with this drawing while developing it as even though I do consider myself a decent sketcher, I'm by no means the greatest. I'm very shy when it comes to sharing my designs because of that but it was my friends who ~~peer pressured~~ kindly suggest I do this. 

Hopefully you think its cool.
